short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that generates a QR code from a URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate QR Codes Easily!

Our app makes QR code creation a breeze. Generate QR codes from URLs instantly.

Features:
	•	Create static and dynamic QR codes for download
	•	Scan QR codes with a webcam

To scan QR codes on your phone, use apps like Barcode Scanner (Android), i-nigma (iOS), or Mobiletag (Symbian).
